item.title: Lost-realm help pleasE!
item.dc:creator: @SpectralResort SpectralResort
item.description:
@SpectralResort wrote:

well i’ have edited all the things i need to put it online, i know how to jar and stuff but when i jar it and send it to my friend… it wont load for him. i was wondering if this would be a problem in Loader.java…

public static final int REVISION = 718;
public static final int LOBBY_PORT = 43594;
public static String LOBBY_IP = “my ip is here”;
public static int SUB_REVISION = 3;
public static Loader instance;
public static int[] outSizes = new int[256];
public static boolean; localhost

is the (public static boolean; localhost) a problem?
PLEASE HELP ME!!! THANK YOU!
please contact me by skype: poneroniii
-Spectral
